==== Practical Factoring ====

<[code][style=basic,language=Python]
e = ('\x00' * (4 - len(e))) + e
n = ('\x00' * (4 - len(n))) + n
[code]>

<[code][style=basic,language=Python]
def f(x):
    return ('\x00' * (4 - len(x)) + x

e = f(e)
n = f(n)
[code]>

<[code][style=basic,language=Python]
def f(x):
    return x.rjust(4, '\x00')

e = f(e)
n = f(n)
[code]>
